global.invalidResponseExplanation: The node returned an invalid response.
global.invalidResponsePollingExplanation: The node returned an invalid response while polling.

addAdditionalSeed.seedInvalidCharsExplanation: Seeds can only consist of the capital letters A-Z and the number 9. Your seed has invalid characters. Please try again.
addAdditionalSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seeds must be at least 60 characters long (ideally 81 characters). Your seed is currently {seed.length} characters long. Please try again.
addAdditionalSeed.nicknameInUseExplanation: Please use a unique nickname for your seed.

changePassword.oopsExplanation: Looks like something went wrong while updating your password. Please try again.
changePassword.passwordUpdatedExplanation: Your password has been successfully updated.
changePassword.incorrectPasswordExplanation: Your current password is incorrect. Please try again.
changePassword.passwordsDoNotMatchExplanation: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
changePassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: La password deve essere di almeno 12 caratteri. Riprova.
changePassword.oldPasswordExplanation: You cannot use the old password as your new password. Please try again with a new password.
changePassword.ensureStrongPassword: Assicurati di utilizzare una password complessa di almeno 12 caratteri.

copyToClipboard.seedClearedExplanation: The seed has been cleared from the clipboard for your security.
copyToClipboard.seedCopiedExplanation: The seed has been copied to the clipboard and will be cleared once you press "DONE" or 60 seconds have passed, whichever comes first.
copyToClipboard.clickToCopy: Click the button below and copy your seed to a password manager.

enterSeed.invalidCharactersExplanation: Seeds can only consist of the capital letters A-Z and the number 9. Your seed has invalid characters. Please try again.
enterSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seeds must be at least 60 characters long (ideally 81 characters). Your seed is currently {seed.length} characters long. Please try again.
enterSeed.seedExplanation: I semi dovrebbero essere lunghi 81 caratteri e devono contenere lettere maiuscole A-Z, o il numero 9. Non è possibile utilizzare semi con più di 81 caratteri.",
enterSeed.neverShare: NON MOSTRARE MAI IL TUO SEME A NESSUNO
